sentence.Network_en: Fastbreak is the Budget express rental service featuring paperless transactions.
sentence.Network_cn: 快攻是预算表示租赁服务具有无纸交易.

sentence.Network_en: Yi had three baskets in the run and Douglas - Roberts two, the last on a fastbreak layup.
sentence.Network_cn: 易建联连续投中3球,道格拉斯2个, 包括最后一个快攻上篮(fastbreaklayup).

sentence.Network_en: Kidd also hit the floor three times, including a hard spill at midcourt after a fastbreak.
sentence.Network_cn: 基德也三次倒在了地板上, 包括在一次快攻后在中场附近的救球.

auth_sentence.content: Humphries seemed to enjoy shushing the Knicks fans who tried to remind him of his fastbreak marriage to Kim Kardashian.
